name: Gravitorque
description:
You are an astronaut stranded on an unknown space station. Use your GRAVITATIONAL TORQUE MODIFIER to manipulate the direction of gravity. With this device you are able to walk on walls, ceilings and cross huge gaps by falling sideways.

[CONTROLS]

NameMobile Web / Gameboy / EmulatorsDesktop WebWalkingD-PadWASD / Arrow KeysRotate GravityA buttonAlt / Z / JSelect save slot or levelA button / Start buttonAlt / Z / J / Enter / Esc
